0.1.name: wordpress/combine-js
0.1.description:
WordPress plugin that combines, minifies, and compresses JS files. The JS files that this plugin combines and minifies must be enqueued by using wp_enqueue_script. The plugin combines and minifies JS and writes the output into files in the uploads directory. This plugin uses jsmin.php - PHP implementation of Douglas Crockford's JSMin. Also see the companion plugin, Combine CSS.

Features include:

  • option to change the JS domain if a CDN is used
  • option to change how often JS files get refreshed
  • option to exclude certain JS files from combining
  • option to turn on/off gzip compression
  • option to turn on debugging
